results.description: The opening round of 2020 Super League fixtures includes a repeat of the 2019 Grand Final between St Helens and Salford.
results.shortTitle: Saints start 2020 season against Salford
results.title: Super League 2020 fixtures: St Helens start v Salford, Toronto open v Castleford

thumbnail.altText: St Helens lift the Super League Grand Final trophy

results.description: Salford sign Huddersfield Giants prop Sebastine Ikahihifo on a season-long loan deal for the 2020 campaign.
results.shortTitle: Salford sign Giants prop Ikahihifo
results.title: Sebastine Ikahihifo: Salford sign Huddersfield prop on loan for 2020 season

results.description: Super League Grand Finalists St Helens and Salford will meet again when Magic Weekend returns to Newcastle in May 2020.
results.shortTitle: Grand Final repeat on Magic Weekend
results.title: Magic Weekend: St Helens and Salford to meet in Grand Final repeat

results.description: Huddersfield Giants sign Samoa prop James Gavet from National Rugby League side Newcastle Knights on a two-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield sign Samoa prop Gavet
results.title: James Gavet: Huddersfield Giants sign Samoa and Newcastle Knights prop

thumbnail.altText: James Gavet in action for Newcastle Knights

results.description: Huddersfield Giants sign Leeds Rhinos full-back Ashton Golding on a three-year deal.
results.shortTitle: Huddersfield sign full-back Golding
results.title: Ashton Golding: Huddersfield Giants sign Leeds Rhinos full-back

results.description: Jordan Rankin is to remain at Castleford in 2020 and Joe Wardle at Huddersfield after the Super League clubs renew their swap deals.
results.shortTitle: Rankin and Wardle swap again for 2020
results.title: Jordan Rankin & Joe Wardle: Castleford and Huddersfield swap deal renewed for 2020

results.description: Huddersfield Giants sign back-row forward Kenny Edwards from fellow Super League side Catalans Dragons on a three-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Giants sign Catalans forward Edwards
results.title: Kenny Edwards: Huddersfield Giants sign Catalans Dragons forward

thumbnail.altText: Kenny Edwards in action for Catalans Dragons

results.description: After his professional rugby league career was ended by injury, boxing now fills the competitive void for Mick Learmonth.
results.shortTitle: Prop to puncher: how injury led Learmonth from rugby league to the ring
results.title: Mick Learmonth: Ex-rugby league player trading passes for punches in boxing

results.description: Louis Senior scores four tries as Huddersfield beat Catalans Dragons to secure their Super League status.
results.shortTitle: Giants win to secure Super League status
results.title: Super League: Huddersfield Giants 24-22 Catalans Dragons - hosts win to secure top-flight status

results.description: A social media blackout, "crazy confidence" and fear of "destruction" are things Super League's relegation-threatened sides are dealing with this week.
results.shortTitle: Super League relegation goes to final day
results.title: Super League: London, Hull KR, Huddersfield and Wakefield prepared for relegation fight

thumbnail.altText: Split image of relegation-threatened Super League side

results.description: Four Super League clubs face a perilously terrifying Friday 13th, as relegation will haunt one of them in the final round.
results.shortTitle: Friday 13th fright night for Super League's four in danger
results.title: Super League: Wakefield, Huddersfield, London & Hull KR battle against relegation

thumbnail.altText: Tony Smith, Simon Woolford, Danny Ward and Chris Chester

results.description: London Broncos lose at Wakefield and are relegated from Super League - relive the action from Friday's five games.
results.shortTitle: London relegated from Super League - the action as it happened
results.title: Super League live: London Broncos relegated - the action as it happened

results.description: Huddersfield's Super League survival battle will go down to the final weekend as they lose to St Helens and London beat Hull KR.
results.shortTitle: Giants not safe after defeat at Saints
results.title: Super League: St Helens thrash Huddersfield Giants 48-16

results.description: Huddersfield Giants head coach Simon Woolford says he would have to leave if they are relegated from Super League.
results.shortTitle: 'Livelihoods on the line' at Giants
results.title: Huddersfield Giants: Simon Woolford says 'livelihoods on line' unless club avoids drop

results.description: Huddersfield score two late tries to take a huge stride towards Super League survival with a thrilling win over Hull FC.

results.title: Super League: Hull FC 12-22 Huddersfield Giants

results.description: Hull FC host Huddersfield Giants while Castleford Tigers travel to St Helens in the Super League - listen to BBC Radio commentary.

results.title: Listen to Hull FC v Huddersfield & St Helens v Castleford commentary

results.description: Castleford boost their play-off hopes with a four-try win that leaves Huddersfield in serious relegation danger.

results.title: Super League: Castleford Tigers boost top five hopes with 24-0 win at struggling Huddersfield

results.description: Salford Red Devils return to the play-off spots as three second-half tries see off a struggling Huddersfield Giants.
